title: Allow selecting each sound effect independently
constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/main.tsx or any other paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths; compose using editable components instead.
Keep all backend logic in the single Motoko actor (backend/main.mo). Create backend/migration.mo only if state migration is required by changes.
Use English for all user-facing UI text.
nonGoals: Do not add new sound event types beyond success scan, error scan, and print complete.
Do not integrate external audio libraries or third-party services for sound playback.
Do not change printer/scanning workflows as part of this request.
